thus obtained, not only differed totally in magnitude 
from the corresponding term given by Plana, but 
was even of a contrary sign. My previous 
researches, however, immediately led me to 
suspect what was the origin of this discordance,
& when both processes were corrected by taking into account the new terms whose existence I had 
already recognised, <s>were calculated & taken into account,<\s> he/I had the satisfaction of finding 
a perfect agreement between the results.
<s>that the results of the two methods perfectly 
agreed.<\s>
June 16th 1853
